name: The royal shirt of Lucifer
data: It decreases the users strength slightly.
It decreases the users dexterity slightly.
It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It has poor armour class for its type (feeble in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impossibly much.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration pathetically.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'quick chant'.
It affects the skill quick chant.
